#summary A list of sites that could be added to Sites.xml
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This page is were I put sites that are known to work with Sites.xml but require a special string be placed in the URL so they are not included with the default Sites.xml file. In the future this site may be not needed once I can figure out how to grab this information on the fly.

== [http://www.nzbs.org/ NZBs.org] ==
The information needed to replace `[I]` and `[H]` can be found at [http://nzbs.org/index.php?action=rss] when you are logged in.

{{{
	<site name="NZBs">
		<feeds>
			<feed name="My Searches Feed">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?action=mynzbs&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="Console">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=6&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="Movies">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=2&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="Music">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=3&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="PC">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=5&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="TV">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=1&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
			<feed name="XXX">http://www.nzbs.org/rss.php?type=4&amp;i=[I]&amp;h=[H]&amp;dl=1&amp;num=[MAX]</feed>
		</feeds>
		<item type="1">
			<title element="title" />
			<size type="1" element="description">
				<regex input="(\d+.\d+)\s(\w{2,4})" />
			</size>
			<url element="link" />
		</item>
	</site>
}}}
